section.name: Mobile phone information update
section.p: The mobile device informationValueEngine Inc.That provided more available. If you want to use the latest mobile device information downloaded device profile save the removed _YYYY-MM-DD and webapps/fess/WEB-INF/classes/device. After the restart to enable change.
section.source: ProfileData_YYYY-MM-DD.csv -> ProfileData.csv UserAgent_YYYY-MM-DD.csv -> UserAgent.csv DisplayInfo_YYYY-MM-DD.csv -> DisplayInfo.csv
